GSD.description:
selinux: allow FIOCLEX and FIONCLEX with policy capability

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.33 by commit 55d192691b4b7063166e7feafbe44db24dbe205c. For more details please see the references link.
